title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 80.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 80.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Chapter 59 of the Laws of 2017 authorizes the operation of

Transportation Network Companies in New York State. This section sets forth the
responsibilities and requirements for such companies, their drivers and the

Department of Motor Vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
80.1

Adopted

New

York State Register August 30, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 35, eff. 8/30/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
